cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning in automotive software, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also focuses on the safety implications of using ML, which is a key concern in the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of ML in driver assistance and autonomous operation, which falls under the categories of robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper provides recommendations on how to adapt the standard to accommodate ML, which involves the development of new algorithms and techniques, falling under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
